Text.Page:
My land was east of here. I was in the fields when the cult came to evict us. They killed my older brother and hung him on a scarecrow!

I want revenge! I've been in this camp a week, but nobody will help.

Friend, will you kill {@LinkCreature:17#301201#Heavens Fall captains} and {@LinkCreature:17#101#partisans}? They have to bleed for what they've done!
Yes. Yes! At last, some payment! I can smell the blood staining the ground. This was for you, Firla! Blood for blood! Here, soldier. May nature smile on you.
